item.title: Booking System Live and Kicking!
item.dc:creator: Christopher (Media)
item.description: Just a short post to say that we are now taking bookings for KIJ 2013. … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Just a short post to say that we are now taking bookings for KIJ 2013. Be sure to take advantage of our early bird offer by paying before the 31st of December 2012!

See you there….

item.content:encoded:
We have updated our KIJ jobs page! Do you have what it takes to help us deliver a fantastic jamboree?

http://www.kij13.org.uk/jobs/

Check out our latest positions!

item.title: 5000 Registered and growing
item.dc:creator: Andy (Chief)
item.description: We now have over 5000 people registered for KIJ13. We hope to have the on-line … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: We now have over 5000 people registered for KIJ13. We hope to have the on-line booking system available soon so that people can start firming up their plans for the summer of 2013. The system will allow you to make alterations so don’t worry about booking too few places as you can add people to your Group, Unit, District or Country contingents as we get closer to the event. We have participants from 13 different countries currently stating an interest and look forward to seeing as many of you as possible at our Jamboree.

item.title: Service Team
item.dc:creator: Andy (Chief)
item.description: We are now interested to hear from people who would like to work on our … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
We are now interested to hear from people who would like to work on our International Service Team. There will be general jobs on offer but please also let us know if you have a particular interest or skill that you can contribute towards the successful delivery of KIJ13.

We will post on this site specific roles that will be available across a range of duties that will include but not limited to site services, activities, entertainment, media, welfare and celebrations. In the mean time please register your interest.

item.title: Happy Easter from KIJ
item.dc:creator: Christopher (Media)
item.description: Happy Easter form everyone at KIJ! We have all been busy bring lots of goodies … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Happy Easter form everyone at KIJ!

We have all been busy bring lots of goodies to KIJ – All to be revealed soon of course! Think of us as Easter Bunnies!

Don’t forget to register for early bird pricing! You still have till Dec 2012 to fully confirm with us! More details on payments to come!

So Happy Easter, and to show we love you all, here is a treat from us:

item.content:encoded:
Are you a Facebook fan?

Click above and don’t forget to hit ‘Like’!

item.title: KIJ is Launched
item.dc:creator: Andy (Chief)
item.description: KIJ is now officially launched. Over a thousand Leaders from across Kent attended the impressive … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
KIJ is now officially launched.

Over a thousand Leaders from across Kent attended the impressive KIJ stand at this years Active8 conference and exhibition, held at the Kent Show Ground, Detling on Sunday 6th March 2011.

Hundreds of people registered interest to either bring a group or participate as a member of the Service Team.

Chris Frankland, Media and PR Manager said

“We have had a fantastic response to our launch today. I did not expect to have queues of people lining up to access our registration pods. The response at times was overwhelming.”

He went on to say

“I am delighted for all the team here today who have put in so much effort to get us here and the really positive reaction from everyone who we have met and spoken to today on the stand, it has made it all worth while. A big thank you must go out to everyone who has shown their support for KIJ and we look forward from here.”

If you have not registered interest and would like to be part of KIJ then please access the registration page on this site.

item.title: KIJ To Launch at Active8
item.dc:creator: KIJ2013
item.description: If you are a member of Kent Scouting you can register your interest for KIJ … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: If you are a member of Kent Scouting you can register your interest for KIJ at Active8 and benefit from the early bird incentives. Join other Kent Leaders and young members at this interactive ‘ideas’conference and show designed to provide support and activity / evening ideas for everyone.

item.title: Early Bird Pricing Announced
item.dc:creator: KIJ2013
item.description: If you book and pay before December 31st 2012, you will receive a £10.00 discount … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
If you book and pay before December 31st 2012, you will receive a £10.00 discount on both participant and adult ticket prices.

Register your interest today and we will inform you when booking on-line becomes available.

item.content:encoded: KIJ’09 is now over! We hope that you enjoyed your KIJ experience! Why not let us know what you thought using the feedback form!
